title: Smoking and kids
creator_credit: Bryon Meyers, Morley Skolnek and Sandler Institutional Films
brief_description: Many children are caught up in peer pressures that induce them to drink, eat, inhale or inject substances that may harm them. This film provides an opportunity to bring some of the children’s problems into the open, and to think about alleviating them.
creator_credit_for_label: Bryon Meyers, Morley Skolnek and Sandler Institutional Films
